Title: A Constant Throb
Plot: With the Sheriff out of camp, Alma is assailed by Hearst's men and as she never would have expected, shelter comes form Swearengen. Barrett is sent to the Gem, but Al resorts to old fashion methods of enquiring to his employers plans. Meanwhile, Langrishe recruits a new actor.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
GuestStars: Sarah Pachelli (Janine),   Jennifer Lutheran (Jen),   Stephen Tobolowsky (Hugo Jarry),   Brian Cox (Jack Langrishe),   Brent Sexton (Harry Young),   Carl Virden,   Jared Snyder,   Victoria Jones Ramorino,
